website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, thoughtful gift your guests will love to use.
pros: Individually wrapped soaps come in a wide mix of scents
Soaps are infused with shea butter and essential oils that leave skin feeling soft
1.9 oz bars, ideal size for party favors
cons: Pack of 15 may be too small for some weddings

customer_reviews.title: I am so sorry I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the one star reviews before I bought this. I just wasted $23. I can't even think of anyone to give them to. They smell so much, an over powering, super soapy smell mixed with cheap perfume. I put one bar on my sink and every time I got within 3 feet of it I could smell it. I had to double bag them and put them outside. Now my hair smells like it, I might have to take a bath to get rid of it. Also I saw a few questions about whether they come in a box or not. Mine came in a ziplock baggie.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy K. Wallingford

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the soaps to bundle with some other things as a gift for the holidays. They are small and chunky and very nice and smell awesome. This would be a great soap to put in the guest bathroom. I may have to buy another set to keep at home.
customer_reviews.author: bailemi

customer_reviews.title: Small, old fashioned
customer_reviews.text: These soaps are tiny. They are about half the size of a typical bar of soap. They are maybe even smaller than that. They have an old fashioned type of smell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walla

customer_reviews.title: Great gift give away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and another set for my daughters baby shower. They have a very strong but pleasing scent. Several guests were swapping for their favorites. The wrappers are really attractive. I will repurchase to have in my bathrooms. I haven't tried washing my hands with them yet. The size is nice so you can have multiples on display. Highly recommend for gift or for bathroom display.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried my first Greenwich soap. Rinsing it off was squeaky-clean but afterward my skin is so nice and soft and the awesome smell lingers softly, not over-powering. I keep smelling my arm! I know I will enjoy going through all the different scents. Very pleased! Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: OhioGranny

customer_reviews.title: smell nice and compact sized
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for multiple baby showers as parting gifts, smell nice and compact sized.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Egerman

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wrappers and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted these for how they would look on our bathroom shelf, and they way they would make the bathroom smell. Works great for that. I haven't used any of them, and probably never will, but that's okay for me.
customer_reviews.author: practicalminded

customer_reviews.title: Sampler
customer_reviews.text: I have used this wonderful sweet smelling soap in the past. So happy I could find a sampler package. Excellent transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hoss

customer_reviews.title: My guests loved them.
customer_reviews.text: some of the scents were a bit too much for me, but I used these in theme baskets. From my shower to yours. My guests loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: These are great little soaps!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is perfect; not overpowering and very pleasant. The variety pack is especially nice. We put them in our closets and drawers and pull one out when we need it. We're very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L Sloan

product_meta.title: Greenwich Bay Trading Company Soap Sampler 15 pack of 1.9oz bars - Bundle 15 items
feature_bullets: French-milled, luxurious vegetable soaps enriched with shea butter, essential oils and natural extracts in captivating botanical scents

15 scents: African Violet, Passion Flower, Fresh Milk and Shea, Black Currant, Island Ginger Mango, Ocean Pur, Seafresh Mineral, Lavender Chamomile, Cucumber, Pineapple Cocoa, Almond, Rosewater Jasmine, Lemon Verbena, Organic Oatmeal and Juicy Peach
Paper-wrapped and offered in a 1.9oz mini soap square. Each Soap measures 2"x2"x1"
Great to sample many fragrances or give as small favors and excellent for baby showers, parties and more
Poly-bagged and ready for your packaging.
